title: Married and Broke
description: A twisted new gameshow from the makers of Fool Me Once, Shame on You. Fool Me Twice, I Punch Your Face! The last couple standing wins the free wedding! May the worst couple fail.
quote: With the economy, we couldnâ€™t sell enough puppies to afford our wedding.
altHero: water with three alligators wearing bridal veils
alt1: game show host holding a fire extinguisher next to a contestant on fire
alt2: couples climb a tower of gigantic champagne flutes
alt3: a couple falls through the air toward a big target on the ground
alt4: woman wearing huge diamond ring around her body flings her partner across an obstacle course of gifts and tin cans
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
